Html:
Hi , i am Mahmoud Darwish a .net developer, i also play WoW with a Mage as my main, i would like to help develop future versions of Rawr.

i have some ideas, like a more friendly interface for talents with a look exactly like Blizzard talent calculator, and some GUI enhancements.
Hey. Great, more help is always welcome. Send me an IM on MSN (cnervig@hotmail.com) or AIM (Astro tSD), and we can chat about how to get started.
